skill.name: navigate_to_point
skill.description: Navigate mobile robot to a desired goal point.

states.name: starting
states.action: Prepare the system to begin navigating the robot.

states.name: execute
states.action: Set the desired goal point and navigate the robot to this point. If the goal is not possible, abort.

states.name: aborting
states.action: Set the velocity of the robot to zero in all directions.

states.name: resetting
states.action: Shut down processes used to set the robot's velocity.
